[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span {
            line: 1,
            column: 1,
            position: 0,
        },
    ),
    Expression(
        ExpressionStatement {
            expression: AssignmentOperation(
                Assign {
                    left: List {
                        list: Span {
                            line: 3,
                            column: 1,
                            position: 7,
                        },
                        start: Span {
                            line: 3,
                            column: 5,
                            position: 11,
                        },
                        items: [
                            Value {
                                value: Variable(
                                    SimpleVariable(
                                        SimpleVariable {
                                            span: Span {
                                                line: 3,
                                                column: 6,
                                                position: 12,
                                            },
                                            name: "$a",
                                        },
                                    ),
                                ),
                            },
                        ],
                        end: Span {
                            line: 3,
                            column: 8,
                            position: 14,
                        },
                    },
                    equals: Span {
                        line: 3,
                        column: 10,
                        position: 16,
                    },
                    right: Variable(
                        SimpleVariable(
                            SimpleVariable {
                                span: Span {
                                    line: 3,
                                    column: 12,
                                    position: 18,
                                },
                                name: "$foo",
                            },
                        ),
                    ),
                },
            ),
            ending: Semicolon(
                Span {
                    line: 3,
                    column: 16,

                },
            ),
        },
    ),
]
